summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details transportation charges, discounts, and payment information, indicating that Epstein had multiple shipments during the specified period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for shipping services provided by FedEx, with multiple shipments listed.

events.title: Shipment Pickup
events.description: A shipment was picked up by FedEx from Jeffrey Epstein's address.

events.title: Shipment Delivery
events.description: A shipment sent by Jeffrey Epstein was delivered.

events.title: Invoice Issued
events.description: FedEx issued an invoice to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services.

locations: 457 Madison Ave Fl 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice number is 7-784-84333, dated August 22, 2005.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $115.39.
The invoice includes details of two shipments made by Jeffrey Epstein.
One shipment was picked up on August 9, 2005, and delivered on August 16, 2005.
The invoice indicates a fuel surcharge applied to the shipments.
